title: Best early Black Friday iPad deals
content:
Macworld

If you can wait until the end of the year, Black Friday is always the best time to pick up a deal on an iPad. While technically a single day (it’s the day after Thanksgiving in the U.S. or November 24 in 2023) Black Friday has gradually expanded to encompass Cyber Monday (November 27), as well as the weeks leading up to the big weekend. These days, in fact, you’re likely to see Black Friday-branded sales and deals through almost the entirety of November.

This means you need to keep your eyes peeled all month long for killer iPad savings. Or, better still, let us keep our eyes peeled for you. This article is where we round up the best-value deals on the various iPad models available in both the U.S. and the U.K., as well as provide automated price comparison tables that will pull in the lowest prices across all the major retailers.

Bookmark this page and check back for the best Black Friday bargains on all the iPad models.

Black Friday 2023: Apple’s shopping event

Every year Apple holds shopping event from Black Friday (November 24) to Cyber Monday (November 27). However, since Apple rarely discounts its products, the event consists of gift card offers rather than actual savings.

In 2023 you can get gift cards for the following voucher amounts with iPads purchased from Apple’s site.

Black Friday 2023: Best iPad deals

Apple hasn’t updated any of its iPads since October 2022, so there should be plenty of excellent deals to be had over the Black Friday weekend. Here are the sales we’re tracking so far:

iPad Pro

U.S.

  • Amazon, 11-inch iPad Pro (M2, 512TB): $1,024 ($75 off, MSRP $1,099)
  • Amazon, 12.9-inch iPad Pro (M2, 128GB): $999 ($100 off, MSRP $1,099)
  • Amazon, 12.9-inch iPad Pro (M2, 512GB, 5G): $1,150 ($149 off, MSRP $1,299)

U.K.

  • Amazon, 12.9-inch iPad Pro (M2, 256GB): £1,194 (£55 off, RRP £1,249)
  • Amazon, 11-inch iPad Pro (M2, 128GB): £839 (£60 off, RRP £899)

iPad Air

U.S.

  • Amazon: iPad Air (64GB): $500 ($99 off), MSRP $599)
  • Amazon, iPad Air (256GB): $650 ($99 off, MSRP $749)

U.K.

  • Amazon, 2022 iPad Air, 64GB, Wi-Fi: £629 (£40 off, RRP £669)
  • Amazon, 2022 iPad Air, 256GB, Wi-Fi: £819 (£30 off, RRP £849)
  • Amazon, 2022 iPad Air, 64GB, Cellular: £778.97 (£70.03 off, RRP £849)
  • Amazon, 2022 iPad Air, 256GB, Cellular: £884.94 (£144.06 off, RRP £1,029)

iPad mini

U.S.

  • Amazon, iPad mini (64GB): $400 ($99 off, MSRP $499)
  • Amazon, iPad mini (256GB): $550 ($99 off, MSRP $649)

U.K.

  • Amazon, 2021 iPad mini, 64GB, Wi-Fi: £527.98 (£41 off, RRP £569)
  • Amazon, 2021 iPad mini, 256GB, Wi-Fi: £701 (£48 off, RRP £749)
  • Amazon, 2021 iPad mini, 64GB, Cellular: £683.98 (£65 off, RRP £749)
  • Amazon, 2021 iPad mini, 258GB, Cellular: £746.59 (£182.41 off, RRP £929)

iPad (9th gen and 10th gen)

U.S.

  • Amazon: iPad (9th gen, 64GB): $230 ($99 off, MSRP $329)
  • Amazon: iPad (10th gen, 64GB): $349 ($100 off, MSRP $449)

U.K.

  • Very, iPad (9th gen, 64GB): £319 (£50 off; Apple originally sold this model for £319, but increased the price to £369)
  • Amazon, iPad (10th gen, 64GB): £449 (£50 off, RRP £499)

iPad Accessories

U.S.

  • Amazon, Magic Keyboard (12.9-inch): $249 ($100 off, MSRP $349)
  • Amazon, Apple Pencil (1st gen): $79 ($20 off, MSRP $99)
  • Amazon, Apple Pencil (2nd gen): $89 ($40 off, MSRP $129)
  • Amazon, Apple Pencil (USB-C): $71 ($8 off, MSRP $79)

U.K.

  • Amazon, Magic Keyboard (11-inch): £299.98 (£19.02 off, RRP £319)
  • Amazon, Apple Pencil (2nd gen): £122.99 (£16.01 off, RRP £139)

For a more comprehensive guide to the available deals–as well as any deals that have popped up since we last updated this article–see our automated tables below for the lowest prices currently available on each iPad model. If you’re not sure which model is right for you, read our in-depth iPad buying guide.

Latest 10th-gen iPad deals

Apple’s 10th-gen iPad (MSRP $449/£499) launched in October 2022, so Black Friday 2023 could bring the biggest discounts to date. We already saw it drop as low as $349 at Target so we’re hopeful for big sales.

Latest 9th-gen iPad deals

The 9th-gen iPad (MSRP $329/£369) from 2021 is still an excellent tablet for kids and people on a budget. It’s regularly on sale for $249 but it could go even lower over Black Friday.

Latest iPad mini deals

The 6th-gen iPad mini (MSRP $499/£569) came out in 2021, but we don’t expect much to change when it’s updated next year. Amazon often sells it for $100 off, so if it goes much lower you shouldn’t hesitate.

Latest iPad Air (2022) deals

In the respects that count—from design to performance, from 5G to accessory support—the latest iPad Air (MSRP $599/£669) is a Pro in all but name. You can often find it on sale for $50 to $100 off so refrain from paying much more than that—and quickly grab one if it goes any lower than $499.

Latest 11-inch iPad Pro deals

Apple’s latest set of iPad Pro models were updated in 2022, but they’re insanely powerful. Major discounts on the 11-inch model (MSRP $799/£899) are fairly uncommon, so if you see savings of $100 or more it probably won’t last long.
